article_title: Will your next meeting be on the holodeck? SAP’s new CIO wants to make it ...
article_text: The battle to attract millennial talent is fierce and companies  have resorted to offering quirky benefits such as free food,  cooking classes and even cash to help with new babies. But SAP’s new chief information officer believes going for cool  technology holds the key to attracting the next generation’s  brightest minds and leaders.Thomas Saueressig, only 31 and a millennial himself, wants SAP’s  meetings to boldly go where no one has gone before: to the  holodeck.
